lines: Pricing is valid for 14 days due to current material market volatility.

Flat-rate pricing includes standard installation conditions only. Additional charges may apply if unforeseen issues are discovered (such as rot, structural damage, corroded shutoff valves, outdated wiring, or code violations).

Material prices are estimated based on current availability. If actual material costs increase significantly before purchase, the customer will be notified and approval will be requested before proceeding.
All work is subject to on-site confirmation. If site conditions differ substantially from the information provided, pricing and scope may be revised before work begins.
